name: HONORED EXECUTION
description:
Goal:

Last as long as you can in an arena filled with battle hardened gladiators!

You are a gladiator sentenced to fight till you die. You have to fight against a constant onslaught of other gladiators coming for your head. Good luck delaying the inevitable.

Controls: 

Use WASD to run.
Mouse to aim your sword.

Credits: 

Cope - Lead Programmer

Memes - Programmer 

Ricky Owings – Music and Sound Effects

TheFlanMan – Art and Graphics

Luxcy – Sound Effects
